attributes.action: Cater for Sikhs, Christians, Hindus & Jews that do not eat halal at Restaurants.
attributes.additional_details: For example the Nandos in West Bromwich does not advertise the meat is halal, however when questioned they advised us it is halal.  This is in no way trying to offend Muslims but they would not eat somewhere that is not halal.  This is not fair on the majority of other's that do no eat halal and enough is not being done to caters for there needs.
attributes.background: We are noticing more and more Restaurants and Takeaways serving halal food when majority of us do not condemn in the halal ritual of the way meat is slaughtered and do not eat halal.  More needs to be done to cater for halal and non halal eaters.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on restaurants and takeaways to take action, not the UK Government or Parliament.
